title: 3.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Look at the image given below:

i. Make the cat move on the path shown by the arrows with three different speeds; (a) slow (b) medium (c) fast.
ii. Make the cat wait for two seconds every time before it turns.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
